newsitem.title: USA: TCBY Enterprises Inc Q4 profit vs loss.
newsitem.headline: TCBY Enterprises Inc Q4 profit vs loss.

text.p: NOTE: 1995 Q4 includes charges of $9.0 million from doubtful accounts and impaired notes, $15.9 million from the impairment of long-lived assets, and $1.4 million in restructuring charges.
1995 year includes charges of $12.6 million from doubtful accounts and impaired notes, $15.9 million from the impairment of long lived assets and $1.4 million from restructuring.
